column1:
1656|4:56|Prager was in his bedroom practicing “Steamy Night on a Steamboat” when his dad knocked on the door. Prager had lost track of time; it was 4:56.
“She’s here
1656|4:56 P.M.|And when that final Friday came
column2: when my packing was mostly done
column3: she sat with my dad and me on the living-room couch at 4:56 P.M. and patiently awaited the arrival of the Good-bye to Miles Cavalry.
